Adam Richard Sandler (amụrụ Septemba 9, 1966) bu onye ome ntọ ọchị America, onye omee na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Saturday Night Live site n'afọ 1990 ruo afọ 1995, tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Hollywood, nke jikọtara iji nweta ihe karịrị $2. ijeri na igbe igbe
Sandler nwere atụmatụ ọnụ ahịa ruru nde $420 n'afọ 2020, wee bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ihe nkiri anọ ọzọ na Netflix nke ruru nde $250
Ọrụ Sandler na-atọ ọchị gụnyere Billy Madison (1995), Happy Gilmore (1996), The Waterboy (1998), The Wedding Singer (1998), Big Daddy (1999), Mr

Deeds (2002), 50 First Dates (2004), The Wedding Singer (1998) Ogologo Yard (2005), Pịa (2006), Ndị toro eto (2010), Naanị soro ya (2011), Grown Ups 2 (2013), Blended (2014), Mystery Murder (2019) na Hubie Halloween (2020)
Ọ kwupụtakwara Davey, Whitey, na Eleanore na abalị asatọ Crazy na Dracula na fim atọ mbụ nke Hotel Transylvania franchise (2012 – 2018).

Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị na-atọ ọchị ya, gụnyere Jack and Jill (2011), a na-atụ egwu, na-eme ka Sandler na-anata onyinye itoolu Golden Raspberry Awards na Nhọpụta ihe nrite 37 Raspberry Award, karịa onye ọ bụla na-eme ihe nkiri na-abụghị Sylvester Stallone, ọ natara nkwanye ùgwù dị egwu maka egwu ya dị egwu
Ihe ngosi na ihe nkiri dramedy Spanglish (2004), Reign Over Me (2007) na Ndị mmadụ ọchị (2009)

A na-etokwa ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ndu ya na ihe nkiri auteur na-eduzi gụnyere Punch-Drunk Love (2002) nke Paul Thomas Anderson, Noah Baumbach 's The Meyerowitz Stories (2017), na Safdie Brothers ' Uncut Gems (2019)
A mụrụ Sandler na Brooklyn, New York, na Septemba 9, 1966,  nye Judith "Judy" ( née Levine), onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara, yana Stanley Sandler, onye injinia eletriki
Ezinụlọ ya bụ onye Juu ma sitere na ndị Russia-Juu kwabatara n'akụkụ abụọ
Sandler tolitere na Manchester, New Hampshire, mgbe ọ kwagara ebe ahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Manchester Central
Mgbe Sandler dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ nọ na BBYO, otu ndị ntorobịa Juu
Sandler gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Tisch School of Arts nke Mahadum New York na 1988
Ná mmalite nke ọrụ ya, na 1987, Sandler gbara enyi Theo Huxtable, Smitty, na The Cosby Show na Stud Boy ma ọ bụ Trivia Delinquent na egwuregwu MTV na-egosi Remote Control
Mgbe ihe nkiri mbụ ya gasịrị Going Overboard na 1989, Sandler rụrụ na klọb ndị na-atọ ọchị, na-ebu ụzọ mee ihe ngosi na agbamume nwanne ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 17
Achọpụtara ya site na onye ọchị ọchị Dennis Miller, bụ onye jidere Sandler na Los Angeles ma kwadoro ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-emepụta Saturday Night Live Lorne Michaels

E goro Sandler dị ka onye edemede maka SNL na 1990 wee bụrụ onye ọkpụkpọ pụtara n'afọ na-esote, na-emere onwe ya aha site n'ịrụ egwu mbụ na-atọ ụtọ na ihe nkiri ahụ, gụnyere " Egwu Ekele " na " The Chanukah Song "
Sandler gwara Conan O'Brien na Tonight Show na NBC chụrụ ya na Chris Farley si na ihe nkiri ahụ na 1995, wee kpọọ nke a na nlọghachi ya na ihe ngosi ahụ dị ka onye ọbịa na 2019
N'afọ 1993, Adam Sandler pụtara na ihe nkiri Coneheads na Chris Farley, David Spade, Dan Aykroyd, Phil Hartman, na Jane Curtin
N'afọ 1994, ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ na Airheads a Brendan Fraser na Steve Buscemi
Sandler gbara egwu na Billy Madison (1995) na-egwu nwoke toro eto na-emeghachi akara ule 1–12 iji nwetaghachi nkwanye ùgwù nna ya na ikike ịketa alaeze ụlọ nkwari akụ ọtụtụ nde dollar nke nna ya
Ihe nkiri ahụ gara nke ọma na igbe igbe n'agbanyeghị nyocha ndị na-adịghị mma
O soro ihe nkiri a na Bulletproof (1996), na ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma nke ego Happy Gilmore (1996) na The Wedding Singer (1998)
A tụbara ya na mbụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke bachelor-party-themed comedy/thriller Very Bad Things (1998) mana ọ kwụsịrị n'ihi itinye aka ya na The Waterboy (1998), otu n'ime ihe mbụ ọ kụrụ.
Sandler guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri ya, Happy Madison Productions,  n'afọ 1999, buru ụzọ mepụta ihe nkiri SNL ibe Rob Schneider Deuce Bigalow: Nwoke Gigolo
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emepụtala ọtụtụ ihe onyonyo ndị Sandler na-esote ruo taa, ma dị na Sony/ Columbia Pictures lot na Culver City, California
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe nkiri ụlọ ọrụ enwetala nyocha na-adịghị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ, ebe a na-ewere atọ dị ka otu n'ime ihe kachasị njọ emetụbeghị  ma ọtụtụ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na igbe igbe
Ndị ọzọ na-apụtakarị na fim Sandler gụnyere David Spade, Kevin James, Steve Buscemi, Chris Rock, John Turturro, Peter Dante, Allen Covert, Jonathan Loughran, na Jon Lovitz
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe nkiri mbụ ya enwetaghị nlebara anya dị oke mma, ọ malitere inweta nlebanya dị mma karị, malite na Punch-Drunk Love na 2002
Nlebanya nke Roger Ebert banyere ịhụnanya Punch-Drunk kwubiri na e mefuru Sandler na fim ndị mbụ na ederede edeghị nke ọma na ihe odide na-enweghị mmepe

Sandler akwagala n'èzí ụdị nke slapstick ọchị iji rụọ ọrụ ndị dị mkpa karị, dị ka ịhụnanya Punch-Drunk ahụ e kwuru n'elu, nke a họpụtara ya maka Golden Globe, na Mike Binder 's Reign Over Me (2007), ihe nkiri banyere nwoke nke na-efunahụ ezinụlọ ya dum n'oge mwakpo September 11, wee na-agbasi mbọ ike ịmaliteghachi enyi ya na onye ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji ochie ( Don Cheadle ).
Sandler gbara ya na enyi ya Kevin James na fim m Ugbu a na-akpọ gị Chuck and Larry (2007), wee kọọ You Don't Mess with the Zohan (2008)
Ihe nkiri ikpeazụ nke Sandler, Judd Apatow, na Robert Smigel dere, na Dennis Dugan duziri ya

N'otu afọ ahụ, Sandler gbara egwu ya na Keri Russell na onye ọchị ọchị England Russell Brand na ihe nkiri fantasy ụmụ Adam Shankman akụkọ bedtime (2008), dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ na-arụzi ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nwere nrụgide nke ọ na-agụrụ nwa nwanne ya na nwa nwanne ya akụkọ ụra na-amalite ime eziokwu
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri ezinụlọ mbụ Sandler na ihe nkiri mbụ n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ Disney
N'afọ 2009, Sandler starred na Judd Apatow's atọ directorial feature Funny People, ihe nkiri ihe nkiri banyere onye ama ama (Sandler) nwere ọrịa na-egbu egbu
E wepụtara ihe nkiri a na Julaị 31, 2009

Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ndị mmadụ na-akpa ọchị, ya, tinyere ịhụnanya Punch-Drunk bụ ndị e zoro aka na ya na ọkwa June 2010 na Sandler bụ otu n'ime mmadụ 135 (gụnyere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri 20) kpọrọ òkù ịbanye na Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
N'afọ 2010, Sandler pụtara na Grown Ups, n'akụkụ Kevin James, Chris Rock, Rob Schneider, na David Spade
Sandler na Dickie Roberts ode akwụkwọ Fred Wolf dere edemede ahụ na Dennis Dugan duziri ihe nkiri ahụ
Ihe nkiri ọchị ọchị nke Sandler na nso nso a, gụnyere ndị toro eto na ndị toro eto 2, enwetala nyocha na-adịghị mma

N'ịtụle nke ikpeazụ, onye nkatọ Mark Olsen nke Los Angeles Times kwuru na Sandler aghọwo ihe mgbochi nke Judd Apatow ; ọ bụ kama "na-acha ọcha Tyler Perry : smart to know better, savvy ezuru ime ya na agbanyeghị, umengwụ ezughi oke ịma."  N'afọ sochirinụ, Sandler gbara ya na Jennifer Aniston n'afọ 2011 ihe nkiri ịhụnanya ịhụnanya Just Go with It
Sandler kwupụtakwara enwe capuchin na Kevin James's Zookeeper, nke ewepụtara na Julaị 8, 2011
N'afọ 2012, ọ gbara egwu na Nke ahụ bụ Nwa m nwoke, dị ka nwoke mụrụ nwa nwoke ( Andy Samberg ) ya na onye nkụzi ya gosipụtara Eva Amurri, na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị

N'afọ 2013, onye ọbịa ya gbara egwu na Disney Channel Original Series Jessie dị ka onwe ya na ihe omume nke isiokwu ya bụ "Punched Dumped Love." Ya na Jessie kpakpando Cameron Boyce na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na Grown Ups and Grown Ups 2 ; Ihe nkiri Sandler nke 2020 Hubie Halloween ka ewepụtara na ncheta Boyce
Sandler ọzọ jikọtara Drew Barrymore na Warner Bros
romantic comedy Blended, nke e mere na South Africa, ma wepụta ya na May 23, 2014.
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2014, Netflix kwuputara nkwekọrịta ihe nkiri anọ na Adam Sandler na Happy Madison Productions
Ọzọkwa n'afọ ahụ, Sandler jikọrọ aka na ihe nkiri nkiri Men, Women & Children, nke Jason Reitman duziri
A tụlere ya maka olu Rocket Raccoon na ndị na- eche nche nke Galaxy mana Bradley Cooper tụbara kama
N'afọ 2015, Sandler wepụtara ya ikpeazụ nkiri nkiri Pixels, dabere na French director Patrick Jean's 2010 obere ihe nkiri nke otu aha, tupu mgbanwe n'ime a nkesa nkwekọrịta na Netflix
Ihe nkiri izizi mbụ ya maka Netflix bụ ihe nkiri ọchị ọchị Western The Ridiculous 6
N'agbanyeghị na ndị nkatọ na-amanye ya n'ụwa niile,  na Jenụwarị 6, 2016, Netflix kwupụtara na elelela ihe nkiri ahụ ugboro ugboro n'ime ụbọchị 30 karịa ihe nkiri ọ bụla ọzọ na akụkọ Netflix
O mere ihe nkiri na fim ise ọzọ na Netflix n'etiti 2016 na 2020: The Do-Over (2016), Sandy Wexler (2017), The Week Of (2018), Murder Mystery (2019), na Hubie Halloween (2020).
Ọ laghachiri n'ókèala dị egwu n'afọ 2017 ya na ihe nkiri ezinụlọ Noa Baumbach The Meyerowitz Akụkọ
Na ihe onyonyo Sandler na-egwu Danny Meyerowitz, bụ onye na-enweghị ọrụ ma kewapụ ya na nwunye ya
Mmekọrịta ya na nwanne ya nwoke na-enwe adịghị arụ ọrụ nke Ben Stiller, nwanne ya nwanyị ( Elizabeth Marvel ), na nna ya nke Dustin Hoffman gosipụtara
Ihe nkiri a malitere na asọmpi maka Palme d'Or na 2017 Cannes Film Festival ebe arụmọrụ ya nwetara ọkwa dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ
Peter Debruge, onye na-akatọ ihe nkiri maka ụdị dị iche iche dere banyere arụmọrụ ya na, "N'enweghị ihe ọ bụla iji daa azụ, a na-amanye Sandler ime ihe, ọ bụkwa ihe dị ebube ikiri"
Na Mee 4, 2019, Sandler mere ka ọ pụta ìhè mbụ ya dị ka onye ọbịa nke Saturday Night Live, na-ejedebe ihe omume ahụ na nkwanye ùgwù nye enyi ya na onye mbụ nkedo Chris Farley
Sandler nwetara ihe nrite Primetime Emmy Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri pụrụ iche na nhọpụta Comedy Series maka oge nnabata ya.
N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2019, Sandler gbara egwu na ihe nkiri egwu egwu mpụ akparaghị ókè, nke ụmụnna Safdie duziri
Ihe nkiri ahụ na ihe omume Sandler nwetara otuto dị egwu yana ọtụtụ onyinye ngwụcha afọ site n'aka ndị nkatọ, bụ ndị kwuru na ọrụ a bụ ọrụ kacha mma maka Sandler
Na Jenụwarị 2020, Netflix kwuputara nkwekọrịta ihe nkiri anọ ọhụrụ yana Happy Madison Productions ruru $275. nde

Atụlela Sandler ọtụtụ ugboro na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, gụnyere na ihe nkiri TV The Simpsons na ihe omume " Monty Can't Buy Me Love ",  na Family Guy na ihe nkiri " Stew-Roids ",  na na South Park na ihe omume " Ị na-eme agadi "
Edekwara ya aka na egwuregwu vidiyo Half-Life: Opposing Force
Ihe omume HBO usoro Animals episode "The Trial" na-egosipụta ikpe ụlọikpe na-akwa emo iji kpebie ma Sandler ma ọ bụ Jim Carrey ọ bụ onye ọchị ọchị ka mma.
Sandler alụrụla Jacqueline "Jackie" Sandler (née Titone) kemgbe June 2003
Ọ ghọrọ okpukpe Sandler, okpukpe ndị Juu
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Sadie (amụrụ Mee 2006)  na Sunny (amuru na Nọvemba 2008)
Nwunye Sandler na ụmụ ya na-apụtakarị na fim ya
Nwa nwanne Adam, Jared, egosipụtakwara na ihe nkiri ya, dị ka Pixels na Home Team
N'afọ 2007, Sandler nwetara $1 Onyinye nde nyere ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ agbọghọ America na obodo ya, Manchester, New Hampshire
Sandler bụ onye nkwado nke Republican Party
Nke a bụ ndepụta akụkụ nke ọrụ ihe nkiri na ihe onyonyo Sandler.

Emebere "Peeper" ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri ọkụ, nke ewepụtara na ngwụcha izu nke 1999 Labor Day dị ka nkwalite maka Stan na Judy's Kid na ihe karịrị nde mmadụ 1 na-ekiri ya n'oge ahụ, otu n'ime vidiyo vidiyo kacha ele na ịntanetị na oge

Na 2009 Sandler nyere onyinye mkpuchi Neil Young " Dịka Hurricane " na- ekpuchi, Mgbanwe na ụda dịka akụkụ nke Warner Brothers 50th Anniversary ememe;  a rụrụ egwu ahụ na David Letterman Show na otu ìgwè nke gụnyere, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, Waddy Wachtel,  bụ onye na Sandler pụtara n'ọtụtụ oge
